de.jannlab.data

Interface ReadPort

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataPort

    public interface ReadPort
extends Serializable
    A read port provides a defined interface for access data for reading.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(double[] buffer, int offset)
      Reads data from the data source and stores the result in buffer.
      void read(double[] buffer, int offset, int[] selection)
      Reads data from the data source and stores the result in buffer but only for a special selection.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        void read(double[] buffer,
        int offset)
        Reads data from the data source and stores the result in buffer.

        Parameters:
        buffer - Target data buffer.
        offset - Offset in the buffer.

      • read

        void read(double[] buffer,
        int offset,
        int[] selection)
        Reads data from the data source and stores the result in buffer but only for a special selection.

        Parameters:
        buffer - Target data buffer.
        offset - Offset in the buffer.
        selection - Selection as array of indices.
